thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Copper Mountain Mining Reports Qtrly Adjusted EPS Of $0.15

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Copper Mountain Mining Reports Qtrly Adjusted EPS Of $0.15
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Copper Mountain Mining Corp:
* COPPER MOUNTAIN ANNOUNCES 2017 YEAR END RESULTS * COPPER MOUNTAIN MINING CORP - QTRLY REVENUES C$85.7 MILLION VERSUS C$84.5 MLN‍​
* COPPER MOUNTAIN MINING CORP - QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.12
* COPPER MOUNTAIN MINING CORP - QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.15
* COPPER MOUNTAIN MINING - IN 2017,SHIPPED & SOLD 73.9 MILLION POUNDS OF COPPER,23,800 OUNCES OF GOLD,264,800 OUNCES OF SILVER‍​ FROM COPPER MOUNTAIN MINE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
